word: G4900 - συνελαύνω - synelaúnō - soon-el-ow'-no - + set at one again

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: + set at one again
to drive together, to compel; to constrain by exhortation, urge
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4862 and G1643; to drive together, that is, (figuratively) exhort (to reconciliation): - + set at one again.
